inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: abdominal pain, bloating and nausea as well as loose bowel movements

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: willing to participate after informed consent obtained

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: available for entire inpatient portion of study and all outpatient study visits

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday

exclusion.criterion: Positive serology results for HIV, HBsAg, or HCV antibodies
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant abnormalities in screening laboratory hematology, serum chemistry, urinalysis
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Sodium 137 meq/L, Potassium 2 meq/L, Chloride 94meq/L, CO2 15 meq/L

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to fluoroquinolones, cotrimoxazole, or ampicillin/penicillin
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of vaccination for or ingestion of ETEC, cholera, or LT toxin
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Stool culture positive for ETEC or other bacterial enteric pathogens
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen

notes: Patient has severe diarrhea and dizziness, but no fever. V. cholerae was seen in stool specimen.
